A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved this movie. There were a couple of things that I think are justifiably vulnerable to criticism\, but overall this is my absolute favorite Star Wars movie. The action is superb. The Character development feels very natural 95% of the time and rewards emotional investment into the characters. I legit cried at the end. The concepts and themes are very interesting and compel you to watch and ask questions. -1 star for Porgs
